kylotto-card-flip.title: Kentucky Lottery Card Matching
kylotto-card-flip.projectDescription: Card matching game featuring a call-to-action for branded games.

content.article: KY Lottery Card Flip uses information from structured data. A matched game is selected at random from the structured data via Javascript. The Javscript then distributes the cards ramdomly onto the table. Users are prompted to, "Flip the cards and find a matching game!" The cards are animated via CSS class names triggered from the game's logic. Both the performance and size of the Javascript was carefully considered in order to serve the largest set of browsers and devices.

images.caption: The cards are randomly choosen and placed on the table.
Users are greeted with confetti and a CTA once the match is complete.

kylotto-speed.title: Kentucky Lottery Speedometer
kylotto-speed.projectDescription: Multiple Banner Advertisement featuring native javascript

mainImage.caption: Need For Speed
mainImage.alt: Kentucky Lottery Speedometer accelerates to full-speed!

content.article: The KY Lotto Speedometer ads feature ultra-lightweight HTML5 built for specific viewport sizes. This project features SVG images and a lightweight project size (<= 200KB). This project leverages the Javascript build tool Grunt. A systematic approach was taken in order to reuse similar code throughout multiple banners. Each banner is programmatically produced based on variables, size and custom NPM Scripts. Each project included a testing dashboard and were validated through the Sizmek Media Platform.

trex-deck.title: Trex: Composite Decking
trex-deck.projectDescription: Unique expandable banner ad utilizing a series of images.

mainImage.caption: Unique banner experience featuring sets of images.

content.article: Trex: Composite Decking aims to emulate 3d animation in under 1.5MB project size. A team of animators developed the scenes and converted to low-framerate jpegs. The jpegs are then alternated in HTML to create the animation. A side-nav calls users to switch between the scenes. The entire ad was served and validated over the Sizmek Media Platform.

images.caption: An animation series featuring how light might damage composite decking.
This menu item show the effects of spilled wine on composite decking.
The Ad can expand or collapse into a smaller banner ad.
Composite Decking is not prone to infestations like some other traditional materials.
